title: Bumpers - Various Artists  1970  FLAC
description:
Bumpers  (Island Records Sampler)  1970


This superb compilation was released as a 'sampler' double vinyl in 
1970. As a 10 year old I got my dad to buy it for me because ...I liked 
the cover..!! It turned out to be one of my favourite albums ever 
because it was solely responsible for giving me the key to the musical 
world outside the top 20 and completely took me off in another 
direction!

It doesn't look like it will ever be re-released on CD, and so, as a 
little project I tracked down all these gems from their own 
corresponding CDs and re-united 'em. 

These are all direct rips to FLAC apart from one ... Dave Mason's 
"Little Woman" which proved to be very elusive, 'so I've had to use the 
very best quality copy I could find, and 're-EQ'ed' it to FLAC.

I would have preferred to do a vinyl rip but unfortunately my copy is 
completely worn out!

'Hope these bring back some good memories :)



01 Traffic - Every Mother's Son
02 Bronco - Love
03 Spooky Tooth -1 Am the Walrus
04 Quintessence - Jesus, Buddha, Moses, Gauranga
05 Mott the Hoople -Thunderbuck Ram
06 Jethro Tull - Nothing To Say
07 Jimmy Cliff - Going Back West
08 Blodwyn Pig - Send Your Son to Die
09 Dave Mason - Little Woman
10 John & Beverley Martyn - Go Out And Get It
11 King Crimson - Cadence And Cascade
12 If - I'm Reaching Out On All Sides
13 Free - Oh I Wept
14 Nick Drake - Hazey Jane I
15 Fairport Convention - Walk Awhile
16 Cat Stevens - Maybe You're Right
17 Renaissance - Island
18 Fotheringay - The Sea
19 Clouds - Take Me To Your Leader

================================================
